title: Nachos
description: Who doesn't love a pile of nachos with all the fixings? Tailor it to your tastes with jalapeño chillies and dips.
ingredients: 2 very ripe avocados, skin and stones removed
1 large ripe tomato, seeds removed, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil
small handful chopped fresh coriander leaves
